import React from "react"; import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from "reactstrap"; class Contact extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { modal: false }; this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); } toggle() { this.setState(prevState => ({ modal: !prevState.modal })); } render() { return (
this.toggle()}> Contact Us
